Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly exceptional. For this exclusive item, I am proposing a price of $200. I believe it reflects its quality and the value it can bring to you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or if you have any questions. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
